CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the Warm-up task to MOT as CHI examines the toys in the room . CHI then walks over to the desk
MOT bends down and moves the toys out of the way
CHI puts his hand up on the desk
CHI looks up at the desk
MOT picks up the toy football and sits down on the floor
MOT turns to look at CHI
CHI turns to look at MOT
MOT holds the football out to CHI
CHI walks over and takes the football from MOT
CHI looks down at the football
CHI holds the football and bounces it up and down
<aft> CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT catches the ball . <aft> MOT hands the ball to CHI
MOT looks at CHI . <aft> MOT extends her hands palms up
<bef> CHI takes the ball from MOT . CHI excitedly throws the football to MOT
MOT looks down towards the picture book
CHI bends down and picks up the toy duck
MOT opens the book on the floor
MOT looks through the book . <aft> MOT looks up at CHI
CHI looks at the book and then around the room
MOT looks up at the camera then at CHI
MOT looks down at the book then glances up at CHI briefly
MOT looks down at the book
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT looks at CHI and points to the picture in the book
CHI turns and looks at the desk
MOT looks at CHI points to the picture in the book
CHI squeezes the duck briefly then drops it as he runs over to the desk
CHI picks up MOT's pocketbook and puts it on the floor in front of MOT
CHI holds the pocketbook and looks at MOT
MOT puts the pocketbook back on the chair
<$=2> MOT picks up the jack+in+the+box behind her and puts it on the floor in front of CHI
<bef> MOT glances up at CHI . <aft> MOT looks down at the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT puts the clown down into the box
<1> MOT looks up at CHI <2-2 .> MOT looks down at the jack+in+the+box . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT closes the lid and winds the jack+in+the+box
CHI stares blankly at the jack+in+the+box
MOT looks at CHI with and expression of surprise on her face then glances up at the camera
CHI sits on the floor and hits the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls open the lid as the jack+in+the+box pops
MOT leans back and watches CHI
CHI pulls on the clown's head
MOT grabs the clown and pushes it in the box closing the lid
CHI leans his head down and looks at the handle on the side of the jack+in+the+box
CHI starts turning the handle back and forth
CHI puts his hand up on the lid
MOT puts CHI's hand on the handle and helps him turn it
CHI pushes the clown back down
MOT helps CHI close the box
CHI tries to turn the handle again
MOT grabs the handle and starts to turn it
CHI puts his hand on the top of the box
MOT turns the handle the stops briefly and grabs the jack+in+the+box from a different angle then MOT starts to turn the handle rapidly
CHI lets go of the jack+in+the+box
CHI sits back looks up at MOT then at the jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI slowly pushes the jack back down into the box
MOT helps CHI push clown down and close the lid
CHI slaps the lid and tries to turn the handle
MOT takes CHI's hand and puts it on the handle and starts to turn it
CHI's hand slips off the handle
MOT puts CHI's hand back on the handle and keeps turning
CHI pulls his hand away from MOT
CHI reaches for something on the floor
MOT turns the handle then stops
<bef> CHI crawls over to the book on the floor then closes the cover and picks it up
CHI looks at the cover of the book
CHI accidentally touches the jack+in+the+box with the book and the jack+in+the+box makes a noise
CHI puts the book on the floor and picks up the toy car
CHI hands the car to MOT
MOT rolls the car along the floor and then pushes it into CHI's foot . <aft> MOT touches the jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches for the car but looks at the jack+in+the+box
CHI lets go of the car and touches the jack+in+the+box
CHI puts his hand on the handle
CHI pushes the clown in the box
MOT tries to close the lid a few times and then finally does then turns the handle once silently
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and looks at CHI
CHI puts his hand on the lid
MOT holds the clown up to face CHI
MOT pushes the clown in the box and closes the lid . MOT starts to turn the handle
CHI looks down at the book on his lap and then turns away from MOT
CHI looks briefly at the jack+in+the+box and then tries to stand up
CHI stands up squeezing the duck and hands it to MOT
MOT takes the duck from CHI
<$=1> MOT looks down at the duck
MOT squeezes the duck and then drops it
<bef> MOT picks up the duck . MOT squeezes the duck
MOT keeps the duck away from CHI and squeezes it
CHI knocks the duck out of MOT's hand
MOT squeezes the duck then hands it to CHI
CHI hands the duck to MOT
MOT squeezes the duck holding it up near CHI's face
CHI runs over to MOT's pocketbook and starts to pull it off the chair
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI puts the pocketbook down in front of MOT
MOT looks at CHI and shakes her head
CHI puts pocketbook on MOT's lap
MOT throws her pocketbook back up on the chair
CHI pulls MOT's pocketbook off the chair and puts it on the floor in front of her
MOT puts her pocketbook back on the chair
CHI goes over to MOT's pocketbook and starts to open it
MOT looks down at the football on the floor
MOT picks up the ball and taps CHI on the back with it
CHI turns and looks at MOT with one hand inside of MOT's pocketbook
MOT puts the football down on the floor and goes over to the chair
MOT snaps up her pocketbook and pushes it to the back of the chair
CHI looks up at the door
MOT sits on the floor and picks up the toy football
MOT holds up the football and looks at CHI
<bef> CHI turned and looked at MOT
CHI takes the football from MOT
MOT holds up the football and looks at CHI
CHI holds the football over his head and looks at MOT
CHI throws the football at MOT
CHI turns around to face the door bouncing the football in his hand
CHI lets go of the football
MOT tries to catch the football but misses so she picks it up off of the floor
MOT looks up at the door
MOT holds the football up in front of CHI then looks up in the air
CHI looks up . CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT waves the football in CHI's face
MOT waves the football in CHI's face
CHI starts to walk towards the table
MOT waves the football in CHI's face
MOT hits CHI gently in the stomach with the football
MOT watches CHI and then looks up towards the wall
CHI tries to close the jack+in+the+box
MOT helps CHI close the box
CHI holds his hand on the cover of the jack+in+the+box and then sits on the floor and stares at the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up towards the door then watches MOT
MOT looks up at the door briefly
INV enters the room to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place .
INV re-enters to explain the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table
INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity but gives CHI the beads to hold
INV takes the Forbidden Object out of the drawer and sets it on the table
CHI stares at Forbidden Object and reaches for it
INV sets the object into motion
<$=1> MOT leans close to CHI and looks him in the face
CHI stares at the Forbidden Object
CHI lets go of the beads
MOT pushes CHI's hand away then puts her hand in front of CHI's hand
CHI looks at MOT and then at the Forbidden Object
CHI moves his hand towards the object and lowers his eyes
CHI tries to touch the Forbidden Object
MOT moves face close to CHI . MOT looks at CHI
<aft> MOT pulls CHI's other arm over to the front of the chair
CHI stares at the Forbidden Object then lowers his eyes
CHI looks up at the object and starts to reach for it
MOT pulls CHI's hand back . <aft> MOT taps her hand on the table
MOT leans back and watches CHI
CHI puts his hand on the table <aft> CHI lifts his hand to touch the Forbidden Object
INV puts the Forbidden Object back into the drawer
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity
<bef> MOT walks over to the desk
MOT takes the box down from the desk
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI walks over to the box
MOT starts to take the ball out of the box
CHI takes the ball out of the box
CHI moves the ball up and down preparing to throw it
MOT holds out her hands and looks at CHI
the ball goes into the box
MOT takes the ball out of the box
MOT gives the ball to CHI
CHI throws the ball violently at MOT
MOT pats her chest where she was hit with the ball
MOT gives the ball back to CHI
CHI holds the ball high above his head and looks at MOT
MOT catches the ball and gives it back to CHI
CHI presses the ball up to his mouth briefly then extends his arms still holding the ball
MOT holds her hands up and looks at CHI
CHI takes a few steps and slowly gives the ball to MOT
MOT takes the ball and drops it into the box
CHI looks down at the ball
MOT lifts up the ball and drops it into the box
CHI takes the ball out of the box and holds it out
CHI takes a few steps and then loses his balance
MOT takes the ball from CHI and throws it once up into the air
MOT gives CHI the ball tapping him in the stomach with it
CHI clumsily tries to throw the ball and finally drops it . <aft> CHI walks over to the desk
MOT catches the ball and puts it in the box . <aft> MOT gets up and walks over to the desk with the box
MOT puts the box on the floor
MOT removes the cover of the box
MOT sits on the floor and pulls the towel onto her lap
MOT lifts the towel up and then lowers it
CHI turns and gets up by leaning on the chair
CHI walks over to the desk
MOT hides her face and then lowers the towel
CHI puts both hands on the edge of the desk
CHI looks up on top of the desk
MOT puts the towel in the box and picks up the lid
CHI stands holding onto the desk and turns to looks at MOT
<bef> MOT puts the towel in front of CHI's face and hides behind it . MOT pulls the towel back
MOT puts the towel on CHI's head
CHI reaches out to touch the papers on the desk
MOT grabs CHI arm and tries to turn him around
MOT pushes the papers back from the edge of the table
MOT lifts the towel up to her face
CHI looks briefly at MOT then back up at the desk
MOT raises the towel then lowers it
MOT puts the towel back in the box
CHI reaches for the pen on the desk
CHI stands next to the table looking at it
CHI starts pulling the paper off the desk with his other hand
<1-3> MOT stands up and comes over to the desk with the peekaboo box . <4> MOT puts her hand down on the paper
<$=1> MOT takes the pen from CHI
CHI looks up at the desk
MOT picks up the paper and pen
MOT moves so her back is to the camera and her actions are not visible
CHI walks around to the other side of the desk
CHI holds onto the chair and looks up at the desk
MOT picks up the next box
MOT holds the box and looks at CHI
<aft> MOT walks over and puts the box down on the floor
CHI watches MOT and sits down on the floor facing the box
MOT removes the cover of the box
CHI crawls closer to the box
MOT takes a piece of paper out and puts it on the floor
CHI looks in the box then sits near the paper
MOT takes a crayon and puts it on the paper
CHI goes over to the box
CHI leans over and reaches in the box
CHI is standing on the paper on the floor
<$=2> MOT picks up the crayon and paper and puts them in the box
CHI sits back and looks at the box holding a crayon in his hand
MOT draws on the paper in the box
CHI looks down at the crayon in his hand
MOT slides the box closer to CHI until it hits his foot
CHI starts to pick up paper then picks a crayon and then the paper
CHI puts the paper on his lap and draws on it briefly . <aft> CHI puts the paper back in the box
CHI starts to pick up some crayons then takes a piece of paper
CHI holds the paper up in one hand and reaches in the box with the other
CHI picks up a crayon then drops it then puts the paper back in the box pushing on it
CHI sits back and looks at the paper in the box
<bef> MOT starts moving the paper around in the box . MOT takes the paper from CHI's hand and puts it on the floor
MOT draws on the paper briefly
CHI looks down at the box
CHI puts his hand on the edge of the box
CHI tips out the contents of the box
CHI holds up the lid of the box
MOT turns and looks at CHI holding up the drawing
MOT puts the drawing in front of CHI
the drawing slips off the lid
CHI turns the lid over puts it on the floor
CHI hands the box to MOT
MOT puts the lid on the bottom part of the box
CHI gets up off the floor
CHI collects the papers together and hands them to MOT
<aft> CHI looks up at the camera
MOT takes the papers and stacks them on her lap
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI goes over to MOT pocketbook and takes it off the chair
CHI sets the pocketbook down on the floor in front of MOT
<bef> MOT glances up at CHI briefly
CHI looks down at the pocketbook
MOT leans over on the floor
MOT picks up some more paper
CHI puts MOT's pocketbook on the paper in her lap
MOT keeps putting the papers away
CHI stands holding the pocketbook looking at MOT
CHI pushes the pocketbook towards MOT
MOT puts the paper in the box and covers the box
CHI tries to give MOT the pocketbook
MOT throws the pocketbook on the chair . <aft> MOT puts the box on the desk
CHI goes over to MOT's pocketbook and pulls on it
<$=1> MOT puts the box on the floor
MOT looks at CHI and sits on the floor
CHI bends down and tries to pick up the book
MOT puts the lid on the floor
CHI stands up and looks at the book
MOT picks up CHI and puts him on her lap
CHI turns the page with MOT
CHI puts his hands on the page and looks down at it
CHI starts to turn the page
CHI holds up the book and gets off MOT's lap . <aft> CHI puts the book back into the box and walks over to the desk
MOT watches CHI . <aft> MOT stares blankly at the door
CHI stands holding onto the table and watches MOT close the box
<4/=1> MOT gets up and puts the book box away
MOT puts the box down on the floor
CHI puts the ball in the box
<aft> CHI turns and looks up at MOT
CHI loses his balance and goes to a sitting position on the floor
MOT pushes the box and sits down next to it
CHI stands up and watches MOT
MOT throws the ball to CHI
the ball bounces off of CHI's chest
MOT picks up the ball and throws it to CHI
CHI tries to catch the ball but misses
CHI looks down at the ball on the floor
MOT pretends to throw the ball to CHI but never lets go of it
MOT pretends to throw the ball to CHI but never lets go of it
CHI grabs the ball and runs up to MOT
CHI throws the ball to MOT then walks away
MOT catches the ball and then hands it to CHI
CHI walks over to the box
CHI looks down towards the floor
MOT throws the ball up in the air and catches it
CHI looks up at MOT , raises one eyebrow and puts his hands out
the ball bounces off of CHI's hand and rolls around the perimeter of the box
MOT throws the ball at CHI
CHI leans forward and sticks his face out
the ball bounces off of CHI's face and into the box
MOT takes the ball out of the box
MOT hands the ball to CHI
CHI tries to put the ball in the box
MOT picks the ball up and gives it to CHI
CHI drops the ball into the box
MOT takes the ball out and holds it up to CHI
CHI looks up at MOT and lightly puts his hands on the ball
<bef> MOT drops the ball into the box . <aft> MOT gives CHI the ball
CHI holds the ball up ready to drop it into the box
the ball rolls across the floor
CHI takes a few steps towards the door
CHI stands watches as INV enters
